Reviews.Title: “Very pleased with our choice”
Reviews.Author: Tony_W60
Reviews.Content: thanks hotel positive spin werent disappointed hop skip jump metro porte de champerret station arrived paris eurostar paris gare du nord 4 porte dorleans line changing 3 pont de line getting porte de champerret metro station lots stairs involved youre happy taking luggage look alternatives wife 23 yr daughter triple 2 double bed single bed top 2nd floor little balcony overlooking court yard sheltered winter window fresh air wasnt cold stated staff excellent clean stairs updown plenty eating options dined da italian road hotel stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Charming little hotel”
Reviews.Author: CharlotteVLondon
Reviews.Content: litterally returned trip paris choose hotel based reviews tripadvisor disappointed hotel easy near metro station excellent basis start sightseeing pereire train station 5 min walk hotel utilized start journey chateau versailles exterior hotel charming reception english 111 fits twinbed perfectly intention spend lot time fine cleaned day spotless arrival allinall excellent stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great price!”
Reviews.Author: sophiesausages
Reviews.Content: visited october stayed nights fantastic location metro bus station rer 2 minuites walk walking distance arc de triumph champs elysses didnt walk 92 bus ran 1015 mins arc de triumph handy tourist attractions rer line metro stations porte de champerret line 3 changes hotel resturaunts mcdonalds subway kebab shop numerous bakerys supermarkets pharmacies wine bars etc 5 mins walk handy busy day grab food home bakerys fantastic bought breakfast lunch drink morning didnt manage spend 4 euros hotel clean beds bins emptied tidied daily basis wasnt huge ample space people triple bathroom bath shower clean television english chanels free wifi flower box window lovely view staff hotel extremley friendly lots information paris attractions receptionists spoke english helpful staff left hotel help shop midnight sunday couldnt easy reach charles de galle airport using metro rer return stay recommended friends lovely little hotel stay paris fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Great location at a fair price!”
Reviews.Author: Ramesh27
Reviews.Content: easy clean fairly priced hotel paris steps metro station surrounded street cafes lovely restaurants types styles champerret travelled wife enjoy days paris perfect easily reached attractions metro neighborhood relaxed safe hotel treasure clean friendly fair price bathroom cleaned daily value money traveling couple recommend larger rely additional services loved return recommend friends family

Reviews.Title: “delightful!”
Reviews.Author: macgregorscairn
Reviews.Content: easily nicest largest single 2 weeks travel clean modern lovely center courtyard window facing quiet street geraniums window box lobby construction doesnt interfere quiet semiresidential neighborhood cafes parks shopping easy distance metro stop block continental breakfast included bit pricey pleasant return paris wont stay else

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and charming Paris hotel”
Reviews.Author: mh24
Reviews.Content: hotel relatively value paris little city center easy via metro stop block located charming paris neighborhood restaurants decent sized europe provided clean comfortable beds balconies beautifully decorated flowers staff incredibly friendly definitely value stay paris

Reviews.Title: “nice stay”
Reviews.Author: ive1983
Reviews.Content: paris expensive terms hotel prices european capitals nice cosy star hotel bathroom spotlessly clean liked residential nice bakery restaurants nearby 15 min walk arc de triomphe sleep time sightseeing short stay reccomend space maybe look else

Reviews.Title: “Great value in an otherwise expensive city”
Reviews.Author: jkaden
Reviews.Content: hotel slightly removed main sites walking distance metro street hotel staff incredibly welcoming pleasant helpful basic clean garden facing quieter facing street heads breakfast included stay costs 10 euro pp basic breakfast half price cafe

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced and not that clean”
Reviews.Author: vickytizer
Reviews.Content: money pay isnt hotel cockroach bathroom bedroom grubby paid 194 euros nights isnt standard expect disappointed surprised majority reviews hotel positive

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Champerret Heliopolis
